errors.error_description: The provided quickstart command `fabric --host user@host -- "your command"` is syntax from the legacy Fabric v1 and is not the primary usage pattern for modern Fabric (v2+). It is confusing and lacks context about creating a fabfile.
correction_candidates: Replace the example with a modern one, showing how to create a `fabfile.py` and run a task with `fab my_task`.
Clarify that this command is for Fabric v1 and provide a separate example for v2+.
Change the command to `fab --hosts user@host -- "your command"` which is the modern equivalent for ad-hoc commands.
Remove the quickstart section as it is misleading.
